title: Tortelloni Soup with Roasted Chicken, Zucchini and Spinach
directions: BOIL broth in a large stock pot. Stir in pasta; cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
REDUCE heat to medium; stir in zucchini, chicken, garlic and oregano. Cook for 5 minutes.
REMOVE from heat; add spinach. Sprinkle with cheese before serving. Season with ground black pepper, if desired.
ingredients: 1 packageBUITONI Refrigerated Chicken & Roasted Garlic Tortelloni (20 oz.)
3 cupszucchini, cut in half lengthwise then sliced crosswise
BUITONI Refrigerated Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese (5 oz.)
